Class PlanetsState

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.gc11.controller.State.AdventureState
it.polimi.ingsw.gc11.controller.State.PlanetsCardStates.PlanetsState
public class PlanetsState extends AdventureState
Represents the state in which a player must decide whether to accept or decline a PlanetsCard during the adventure phase. Each player, in turn order, must decide whether to land on a planet or skip the opportunity. If a player accepts the card:
  • The state transitions to LandOnPlanet where the player can choose a planet.
  • The resolvingAdvCard flag is set to true to prevent duplicate acceptance.
If a player declines:
  • The turn index is incremented.
  • If all players have declined, the game transitions to IdleState.

    • PlanetsState

      public PlanetsState(AdventurePhase advContext, int numVisited)
      Constructs the PlanetsState with the given context and count of planets already visited.
      Parameters:
      advContext - The current AdventurePhase context.
      numVisited - The number of planets that have already been chosen by players.

  • Method Details

    • acceptAdventureCard

      public void acceptAdventureCard(String username)
      Called when a player accepts the PlanetsCard.

      This sets the resolving flag and transitions the game to the LandOnPlanet state where the player will select a planet.

      Overrides:
      acceptAdventureCard in class AdventureState
      Parameters:
      username - The username of the player accepting the card.
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - If it is not the caller's turn.
      IllegalStateException - If the player already accepted the card.

    • declineAdventureCard

      public void declineAdventureCard(String username)
      Called when a player declines the PlanetsCard.

      This advances to the next player or transitions to IdleState if all players have declined.

      Overrides:
      declineAdventureCard in class AdventureState
      Parameters:
      username - The username of the player declining the card.
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - If it is not the caller's turn.
